meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an oscilloscope.
meanings.sent1: The oscilloscopic display showed the electrical signal graphically.
meanings.sent2: The technician used the oscilloscopic device to analyze the waveform.
meanings.sent3: The oscilloscopic screen looked like a colorful dance of lines.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an oscilloscopic map of thoughts, constantly shifting.
meanings.sent5: The oscilloscopic image was as clear as a sunny day in spring.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of an oscilloscope.
meanings.sent1: The oscilloscopic experiment required precise measurements.
meanings.sent2: The students conducted an oscilloscopic investigation in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The oscilloscopic test felt like a high-tech science project.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the oscilloscopic room, analyzing the data.
meanings.sent5: The oscilloscopic procedure was like following a trail of breadcrumbs.

meanings.definition: Displayed or measured using an oscilloscope.
meanings.sent1: The oscilloscopic readings indicated a problem with the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The oscilloscopic measurements were recorded for further analysis.
meanings.sent3: The oscilloscopic graph looked like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: Her heartbeat was an oscilloscopic rhythm on the monitor.
meanings.sent5: The oscilloscopic data painted a picture of the electrical activity.
